subs.text: Manchin is a tool. Obviously he's being paid off. We even know how. That said, perhaps we can put together a GoFundMe to get him even more money than his backers are giving him, to do the right thing. If he can be bought, in other words, why don't we just buy him??

It would be something for Wolf Blitzer to talk about. They could even have a box on CNN saying how much money had been raised so far. Reporters could ask Manchin all the time if $5 million isn't enough, what is your actual price?
He would say "I don't have a price" and we'd just..
